attributes.additional_details:
With newspaper reports of the axing of BBC 3, i feel this needs to be reviewed.

An online channel would suit some, but not the many who don't have access to the internet or smart tv's.

Maybe something needs to be looked at whether it be a consultation through the house or through social media.

I certianly feel that BBC 3 has done wonders for the comedy scene and is a teenange/young adult channel which needs a place as a mainstream channel.

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the BBC.
